thread.title: 'Little People' stars Jeremy, Audrey Roloff announce pregnancy
thread.title_full: 'Little People' stars Jeremy, Audrey Roloff announce pregnancy | Fox News

author: foxnews.com
title: 'Little People' stars Jeremy, Audrey Roloff announce pregnancy
text:
Associated Press   Email Print "Little People, Big World" stars Jeremy and Audrey Roloff are expecting their first child together.
A post shared by Audrey Mirabella Roloff (@audreyroloff) on Jan 2, 2017 at 4:57am PST 
The pair  tells Us Weekly  that Audrey Roloff discovered she was pregnant after returning home from a gender reveal party for Jeremy's twin brother, Zach Roloff, and his wife, Tori, who are expecting a baby boy in May.
She says she "was so surprised" after seeing a positive result on a pregnancy test. The 25-year-old says it could be the start of a large family. She says she wants "at least four" children.
The baby is due on Sept. 1.
We've been keeping a secret... and now the secret is finally out! WE'RE PREGNANT Expecting our first baby this Septemberüë∂üèº We are brimming with uncontainable joy, excitement and praise to God the author and creator of life! Baby Roloff, we are praying everyday for your protection, health, and that you would love the Lord with all your heart (oh...and have curly hair)üôèüèª See you in 6 months üíï Follow our pregnancy journey on aujpoj.com #journeyofjerandauj #beating50percent üì∑ @dawn_photo
